name: Pest Control (doubtfulgames)
description:
It's night.

A kitchen in suburbia is about to be overrun with bugs – the humans who own the kitchen made the unwise decision of leaving sugary treats laying out on the counter.

Luckily, while they're sleeping, you appear.
You're a gnome, dedicated to protecting this one room that's stuffed with sugary treats.

Grab your pea shooter, your explosive peppercorns, and your toothpick launcher – it's time for some Pest Control.

Controls:
Aim and shoot with your mouse.
WASD movement
SPACE to pick up a weapon
